Description: Limestone ostracon; two pieces re-joined. A copy of the Teaching of Amenemhat (11 to end 12, and 13a to 14a).
Curator's comments: The copy of the Teaching of Amenemhat is unpublished; identified by R. J. Demaree, pers. comm 2008. Unpublished in F. Adrom, Die Lehre des Amenemhet (BAe 19, 2006). Translation of Amenemhat: Parkinson, The Tale of Sinuhe and other Ancient Egyptian Poems 1940-1640 BC (Oxford World's Classics 1999), 203-11.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (391898) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/391898)
